metadata.siteDescription: Block & Block is a freelancer association in the Ruhr area, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany, which specializes in the development (and occasionally conception) of Android Apps.
metadata.keywords: Dennis Block, Gregor Block, Block und Block, Block, Android, freelance, software engineer, app developer

contact.subject: bandb.dev - Contact form
